string.name: enterlabel
string.u: Enter a label for this password.

resources.string: Thank you for downloading this app!\n\nThe blue lock button (top left) is how you access your password vault. You must use a PIN to gain access. (PIN can be setup by clicking the button or select PIN Management in the menu)

Passwords are placed on cards, which are in a scrollable list.
Any time you navigate away from this part of the app, your vault will close. 

Click a card once to save the password to your clipboard. 

Press and hold a card to delete the password from your vault. (Another dialog will appear for confirmation to avoid accidental deletions)
